Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First, the task is to analyze the event log and rename activities that appear multiple times within a single case to reflect their contextual differences. The same activity names appear multiple times but with different meanings based on context.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The task involves reviewing an event log to identify activities repeated within a single case. These repeated activities have the same name but differ in meaning based on their context.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The goal is to rename these activities to reflect their contextual differences. This ensures clarity in understanding the distinct roles each instance plays within a case.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Initiate Request and Approve Request appear once per case, so no renaming needed. Verify Documents recurs in C001 (twice), C002 (once), and C003 (twice); Call Customer recurs in C001 (twice), C002 (twice), and C003 (once).

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: In C001, Verify Documents happens initially (finds missing docs) and later (re-checks after submission).
